name: Common Enterprise
tag_list: consumer, digital, mobile, marketing, web-2-0, sustainability, green
overview:
Common Enterprise connects everyday products by developing the worldâ€™s first smart product grid.

Similar in concept to the smart energy grid, the smart product grid is a software-as-a-service platform with web and mobile applications that maintain connectivity for consumer products throughout the productâ€™s entire life cycle - from when they are purchased to when they are discarded.

Common Enterprise forms a connection between the consumer, the product and the producer for life of the product.

For consumers, Common Enterprise delivers the digital experience for everyday products.
For producers, Common Enterprise provides a digital connection to customers for the entire life of the product.
For marketers, Common Enterprise empowers the most contextual digital marketing opportunities possible. For sustainability, Common Enterprise enables the infrastructure to make cradle-to-cradle a reality.
